channel.title: Events on Sensu Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Sensu Docs

item.title: Events reference
item.description: An event is a generic container used by Sensu to provide context to checks and metrics. The context, called observation data or event data, contains information about the originating entity and the corresponding check or metric result. An event must contain a status or metrics. In certain cases, an event can contain both a status and metrics. These generic containers allow Sensu to handle different types of events in the observability pipeline.
